title: Personal Website
description: My first website built with HTML and CSS. It has some information about me.
content:
This is my first website. I made it to learn HTML and CSS. It was fun to build.

I learned a lot about web development from this project. The website has information about me and my hobbies.

title: Simple Calculator
description: A basic calculator that can do math operations like add, subtract, multiply and divide.
content:
I built this calculator to practice JavaScript. It can do basic math operations.

The calculator has buttons for numbers and operations. When you click them, it shows the result.

title: Todo List App
description: A simple app where you can add tasks and mark them as done when you finish them.
content:
This todo list helps me keep track of things I need to do. I can add new tasks and check them off when I'm done.

I learned about JavaScript arrays and DOM manipulation while building this.
